State Service (Restructuring) Order (No. 2) 2014

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 11 of the State Service Act 2000 .

28 May 2014

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

WILLIAM E. F. HODGMAN

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the State Service (Restructuring) Order (No. 2) 2014 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2014.

3. Change of name of Government department
    The name of the Government department known as the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources is changed to the Department of State Growth.

4. Amalgamation of Government departments
    The Department of Economic Development, Tourism and the Arts is amalgamated with the Department of State Growth.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 May 2014

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
